subject: Re: /s, /g and /m modifiers
body:
On Jun 1, 7:16 am, mri...@gmail.com (Paul Lalli) wrote:
> the string "onex\ntwox" will match /o(.*)x/ by setting $1 to 'on'.  

Obviously, I meant $1 would be set to "ne".  My bad.

Paul Lalli
